titleStmt.title: Tal Ilan Lexicon, Master List -- Aurelia-Aurelia

state.note: Auguria (1), Agathopus (1)’s mother, Aurelius (14) Joseph (66)’s wife
Celerina (1), Sempronius (1) Basileus (2)’s wife and pupil
Onesime (1), Titedius (1) Amerimnus (1)’s wife, Euelpistus (1)’s daughter
Appia (1), Artanus (1)’s daughter, Aurelius (60) Gemellus (3)’s mother
Artemia (2) Corcaina (1), Marcus (40) Aurelius (87) Moles (1)’s wife
Altar with male and female bust, Suwarek
